11-13, 19. An Angel Guided David's Writing.--The Lord, through His angel, instructed David, and gave him a pattern 
                                                                           1129
of the house which Solomon should build for Him. An angel was commissioned to stand by David while he was writing out, for the benefit of Solomon, the important directions in regard to the arrangements of the house. David's heart was in the work (1SP 387, 388).
